DESCRIPTION: Activate #yConvolution and all #yAttention #yHead s' effects in discard pile.
During #yForward #yPropagation, play a #yFeature #yMap with attacks and blocks, whose values are equal to the convolution of all card values in the discard pile multiplied by the 20% #yAP.
Current loss of the model. Reducing the stacks of #rLoss is beneficial for improving the #yAP .
Demonstrated the current model's adaptability to unseen datasets. High Overfitting stacks would make the battle tought.
Model performance on testing set, which affect the effectiveness of some of the cards and powers.
